name: Zombie Village
description:
Your village is infected with a virus, all people have turned into zombies and you are no exception. But the spark of life still burns in you. Your goal is to destroy all the zombies in the village so that you can live on. You have at your disposal 6 types of different weapons to kill.
Find all the zombies in the village and kill them.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
